content.detailedDescription: It was around 11pm i was outside on clear night star gazing when i noticed a strange object slowly moved over my house.  it passed directly above me and i could see it was transparent and icould see the shape of a triangle.  it was almost invisable made stars look wavy from my view looking up.  no noise.  lasted about minute no time to record.  i live by lackland airforce base.  maybe 15 feet long.  just read a report from guy in north coralina who recorded one on his infared.  he also noted transperency and triangle no noise.  definietly what i saw.  the shape is can be seen but at first glance you wouldnt until passed directly over you.  reminded me of predator cloak but more clear.
content.summary: Saw transperant triangle ufo fly over my house

content.detailedDescription: I traveled to the rocky mountains to go camping with two friends (a couple) and we witnessed some strange lights in the sky. i took a couple pictures and captured 3 short clips from my cell phone. the videos are a little hard to see but you can see the blinking lights. we had set up our tents and made a fire. we saw what looked like a very low silent plane fly over head very low very silent. i noticed the colors on it seemed a little strange. i served several years in the military and i never saw the lights blink that fast in that motion. well i never took my eyes off the object as it flew out toward the horizon. i finally got the courage to tell my friends i was still looking at it.I dont think at first they gave it much thought or paid much attention. they came over to where i was standing and were both amazed when they saw it bopping up and down like a balloon and also noticed the colors were strange. that one stayed i nthe sky for hours. during that time we noticed two more exact same type of craft fly over head and did the same thing. the last one the flew over was blikin very fast and changin colors and took off i only got a minute of video of that one.
content.summary: Vacation in the rocky mountains. friends and i saw 3 ufos

content.detailedDescription: Getting up to go to work. a very bright light low in the sky not moving and silent. thought it was a helicopter but there was no sound and hellicopters have different lights than these. i tried to wake up my husband to look because he believes in ufo's. i stopped wstching because i had to go to work. i mentioned it again to him after out local facbook page lit up with people talking about this light and found out it has been happening for 5 nights in a row. on a personal note we will be heading down to the sight in the early am tonight
content.summary: Randomly flashing bright light, silent. this has been going on for six nights in a row. many in town have made comments

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Having a cigarette at work 8pm, steeles and martin in milton ontario. the sky was turning reddish dusky, scattered clouds. im an aviation buff so was looking at an aircraft flying south of my position, west to east when i noticed an aircraft moving from east to west below the clouds. i thought it strange because it seemed quite close because the three or four brilliant white pulsating lights were moving as one but occupied 2/5ths of the quadrant of viewable sky(trees on either side). as it was reaching the middle if my view i payed close attention to ascertain a shape but could make none out. just a row of lights. i could hear nothing. without a doubt, the aircraft should be enormous and it must have been the size(based on distance between the first and last blinking lights) that aroused my curiousity because it was too close and too low.

it took a few seconds before i was confident enough that this was not a typical aircraft then i yelled out to a colleague. he came running. we saw only white lights(typical only of approach lights). the aircraft seemed to get smaller, rapidly. the white lights pulsating in no order. it was now flying away from us, southwards towards burlington sort of weaving right to left until, in the space of 20 seconds, it was as far away as 50-60kilometres. (only an estimation based on the initial proximity and apparent length) we both agreed the speed must have been phenomenal. i am willing to describe if contacted but not comfortable giving contact details.

all my distances are only guesses. the order in my description as scattered as my present frame of mind. we are directly below a point where large commercial aircraft begin approach to pearson airport and a few kilometres from burlington skypark where small aircraft also fly. two of my colleagues are private pilots and we are always planespotting. as a background, my family are aviation employees. i fly simulators as a hobby and have flown cae's airbus and shortly the crj. i also fly rc planes. in short, unless this were a squadron of military aircraft, i would be stumped to come up with an explanation.
content.summary: Very long aircraft with only 3-4 brilliant white strobes travelling east to west over milton, ontario canada

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on board alien vessel. standing with small group of people maybe 30-50 people on deck of ship. everyone seemed confused and anxious. i could see railing behind woman talking. she was tall and slim with short cropped black hair with red shirt and black pants. her complexion was white. the area behind the railing was vast open area of ship. we were on upper level. a lot of activity. she said we had all been selected to board their ship and ask questions. someone asked where did they come from? she said they came from very very far away. i asked how do they have children? she showed me instantly desert-like area on her home planet that had many dome-like structures. i could see around 20 or more structures. she said the babies live in these domes the first six (6) months so the mothers can work. they had a working society where everyone works. they are then returned to their parents. 
m. melton asked me to submit this report. 
submitted by tom k.
content.summary: Standing with small group of people on deck of space ship. very large ship. i could see railing behind tall slim woman in red uniform top, short black hair. she said we had all been selected to board ship. she said she would take questions.

content.detailedDescription:
December, 2006 3:30am i woke up and was sleepless so i went outside to my deck to smoke cigarette. wind was blowing and it was very foggy. i looked up and saw to my left in northern direction the clouds were rolling and tumbling in fashion i had never seen before at the 1:00 angle. i thought this looks like the movies on close encounters of the 3rd kind. almost instantly the clouds separated and a large amber orange colored object appeared, not sun, could see moon to the side.  object not blinding. i watched for at least 25 minutes or more as object moved to right slowly separating the clouds as it moved. i even heard someone yell "tell it to come to you!" as i said before it was a foggy night. at the 5:00 angle it dropped out of view. i immediately went inside and wrote down what i saw. 
the next day i called peter davenport at the national ufo reporting center. he asked me then to do a report. 
m. melton asked me to do this report. 
submitted by tom k.
content.summary: Breezy december night. i observed clouds tumbling and rolling, then clouds seperated and objected large amber orange object appeared 3 times size of the moon.  i could see the moon to left of object in sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were at work saying goodbye to a customer.  it had the appearance of an object falling from the sky with a contrail.  it first looked like some type of aircraft.  the object was determined to be at an extreme altitude due to the fact that a large aircraft passed below at approximately 10,000 feet.  it appeared to be teardrop shaped with lead gray color with a mist aura and a contrail which remained the same size throughout the event.  it was approximately 45 degrees above the southeast horizon traveling from west to east and did not seem to be traveling at great speed.  we were wondering at first if we were being attacked by a missile, due to the fact that it is september 11th.  afterwards we felt that it was some type of unexplained object that we had never seen before.  we watched the object till it disappeared over the horizon, which took about 15 minutes.
content.summary: Lead gray object with white aura with contrail that remained same size throughout event.

content.detailedDescription:
I hope this works, i've tried your site before and the page was broken and i wasted my time, but i'm sure it's ok now :)

i can't remember too well the exact time of the event, i'm 39 now, but it happened when i was in my mid-teens, probably about 15, on broad street, surrey, between the roundabout where the aldershot road and rydes hill road meet, and wood street village.

i was cycling to my morning paper round, early on, it was still dark. about 5-5:30 am would be about the time.

i noticed as i got onto the straight stretch of broad street, that there was an oval, bright white light, about 40ft wide by 10-15ft high ahead and above me. it was swinging from side to side, as if on a pendulum, and totally silent. i immediately thought ufo! cool! 

as i continued cycling (all the houses along the street had their lights out, so i guess everyone was asleep - most people were at that time of morning) the ufo? began to communicate with me, telepathically... the thing is, the communication did not have any emotion, no positivity, no negativity, no urgency, no disdain, no happiness, no sadness, nothing like that at all, it was perfectly neutral, i'd never had anything like this before (and never experienced telepathy before) i tried projecting back communication with my mind, and we had a conversation. unfortunately i cannot remember the conversation (i'd really like to, trust me!) this lasted about 5 minutes, until i got near to the base of the hill climbing to wood street village itself... i had the suspicion that i had been found by aliens, as i was ahead of everyone else at school, and picked up on anything i was taught very readily, maybe that's just big headed, but i was regarded as a child genius. 

then the ufo asked me if i'd like to come onboard (again with telepathy) i'd been having a calm conversation with it, as it kept pace with me, moving along at my speed, ahead and above of me, swinging from left to right, on an invisible pendulum, silently for about 5 minutes. my initial reacion was "yes yes of course!" and i got the sense i would get a free ride and see things i'd never seen before! but then i panicked! - i might never see my mum and dad, my sister, my cat, my friends, planet earth, anything i knew, ever again, so i screamed back telepathically - "no no no ! wait, let me think, no ! wait, i don't know!" or something along those lines!

it was at this point that i lost track of the ufo as i entered the trees and had to climb to the top of the hill. about a minute later (i was a very fit cyclist in my youth, not anymore!) i got to the top of the hill. i looked south, towards normandy way. i saw the ufo, bright as anything in the still black early morning sky, and it had moved a good 2-3 miles, totally silently. it was now stationary a few miles away, still lowish to the ground.

i told my dad, a retired aeronautical engineer about my siting, and he said it was not a ufo, it was just a helicopter, and i only thought it was so low, because of the effect of parallax error. but i don't believe this, nothing man made could travel 3 miles silently in a minute. 

this is verbatim, to the best of my memory, and i will swear on my life that it actually happened. 

whether or not it was aliens, i have no clue. i'd like to think it was though.
content.summary: Ufo (totally silent) hovered in front of me, bright white oval light, swaying as if on pendulum, 50-100 ft above me, communicated with telepathy, lost sight, then it had moved 2-3 miles

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 6:00 - 6:30am, 1998, angeles city, philippines. i was still in highschool, waiting outside our doorstep for my ride to school.

sky is super clear blue without any clouds then i saw this 3 star-like white dots flying across. speed is normal, commercial airliner speed. these 3 star-like white dots in a triangle form are rotating, exchanging positions (imagine a triangle rotating).

they just passed by at normal commercial airliner speed, no sudden movement, no change in speed. just cruising in straight line.

there also no obvious visible connecting material between the 3 star-like white dots to hold them together.

from there on, i haven't seen them again.
content.summary: 3 white star-like rotating, exchanging position counter clockwise flying straight normal speed

content.detailedDescription: This is what happened i had called coast to coast radio show to share my ufo abduction story.Then the next night i was having a cigarette in my backyard looking up at the sky and saw something like a shooting star and then looked down at the yard and there was 3 to 5 basketball sized orbs floating around the backyard one of them went above the house near the back door and that spooked me so i went in and shut the door.I think they came back the next night but when i came outside they shoot upward towards the sky.I have not seen anything since.
content.summary: Abought 3  to 5 orbs showed up while i was in backyard at night

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were out on road for jogging or morning walk,early morning at 10th of september. we in streets walking together.At that time sun had not risen up, so it was much dark all around.There was even no moon light as that morning it was quiet cloudy.Only few stars could be seen.I felt quiet tiered so we both sat on the road.I started gazing in the sky at stars then i noticed a star shining brightly more brightly than other in the sky that were seen in the sky.My full attention went to it and i realized it was moving.At first i thought it would be just a effect of my sleepiness but then i realized that it was really moving.I asked my friend to give it a look.He also said that it was moving.It started moving in a straight path.It was just looking like a star but shining more brighter white than any other star.Then i gave a thought that , it might be seemed moving as earth rotates but than i realized that earth dose not rotates that fast as it was moving,and even no other star was moving.So,it was clear for me that it is not a star,but it looked just like a star.It was shining white brightly. it even did not made any sound while flying. its shape,body or any other features were not able to get identified as it was shining bright.Then i thought it could be an airplane but airplane has more lights that keep on pulsating,and that are under its wings,but so such other light could be seen.My friend ignored all this as he is quiet a dumb type of guy,but i could not remove m eye from it.I saw it moving more quick than it was moving initially from when i noticed it moving, and that thing moved from where i first saw it straightly in opposite direction until it became out of my sight.I was bit of confused and excited as just few minutes ago i was watching a star and that star like thing just flew straightly from where i first saw it to the other end of the horizon,out of my sight, and all this happened in around less than 10 minutes. i cannot surely say what it was but as all conditions apply it cannot be anything else even.
content.summary: I was on road for a morning walk with my 1 friend and it was all dark at that poit of time in early morning.We sat on the road and then i started gazing at the stars,and noticed a star-like thing moving in the sky below the cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: While i was walking my dog i was looking up at all of the high flying airplanes, and then noticed a low flying whiteish blue light moving west to east on a no cloud, clear night.  as i was watching it for a few seconds the object then began to flutter and get smaller, to what appeared to be the object ascending away from earth.  after a few seconds of ascending the light was gone, and never came back.  i will never leave my phone int he house again.
content.summary: Saw a low flying object, whiteish blue, moving w to e, then the object ascended out of view.

content.detailedDescription: Walking home from a friends place, not intoxicated. first noticed the object moving faster than anything man made in the sky. i knew the object could not have been a shooting star or meteor as there were three perfect lights aligned moving in synchronicity very fast across the sky, under orion's belt, north to south. three lights looked like they could be space craft moving together at fast speed through the nights sky. i instantly had years in my eyes as i was by myself and with a dead phone, i was at a loss for words, knowing that this was something i had never seen before as someone who has spent hours looking at the sky. the three lights eventually got too far to the south i lost view.
content.summary: Three lights flying faster than jets through the sky very close together for a long distance.

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:50pm wife and i came home from having dinner out. pulled motorcycle up to garage and open the garage door. when turning around to get back to the motorcycle i glanced upwards and noticed an unfamiliar light pattern on something moving easterly in our skies above. i figured it was just a plane or helicopter, but what caught my attention about it was that the position of lights and the way they were flashing was different than any aircraft i'd ever seen in our night skies before. i could not determine an aircraft shape but the lights were patterned in a set of 3 pairs of 2 lights like this : : : with the last pair being green, the middle being red, and the first pair being white. the way they flashed pretty much was like this 2 flashes of the green pair followed by 2 flashes of the red pair, then back to the same with the green pair, then red etc. the white pair flashed only one time while i was watching. these lights were coming towards us (my wife was there also and witnessed all this), at first very, very slowly, but were increasing in speed, then suddenly they came to a complete halt, and did not move in the sky again for around 10-15 seconds. it was at the time that it came to a stop in the sky that the pair of white lights flashed twice i think. then the green pair of lights flashed again and the pattern of green, red lights started again. they began moving easterly again but very, very slowly, then suddenly without seemingly turning at all, they just started heading west. slowly at first then quickly speeding very, very quickly. it was moving quickly enough that it was getting out of my viewing range. i ran to my front gate to try and get out in my front yard to follow what it was dong, but by the time i got to my gate and opened it, the lights were gone. i almost didn't want to report this to you as i really didn't feel that this event was all in all very spectacular, but the lights were patterned so differently (not like wing tip lights at all, and the fact that no aircraft i've ever heard of can just stop in the air and go in reverse, caused me to describe to you what we saw. i would guess that this took place at about 800-2000 feet up. we had cloud cover at this time and whatever we were seeing was below that. i would guess that at the fastest speed i saw it moving, and comparing the distance it covered at this speed was above 500 mph, and we didn't hear a sound coming from it. estimate of distance west from where we were standing would be at 1 mile +. this could very possibly be something of ours i am just not informed of???
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unfamilar aircraft lights that flew in straight line,stopped and reversed

content.detailedDescription: I was taking groceries in from my car and saw the object and called my son downstairs to look at the object. my son thought it was a weather balloon, but it was hovering. the object was silver or lead colored. it had red lights on what appeared to be a dome, and white lights on the side. if was disk shaped, like a saucer. it was moving very slow from the north, it was hovering. and then it took a westerly turn and went behind trees and we lost sight of it. we also heard sirens behind the trees. so maybe we weren't the only people who noticed this unknown object. my son said that he could hear a beeping or humming sound coming from it as it moved. we were both shocked and confused about this.
content.summary: Silver object spotted over asheboro nc

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on a deck near the ocean in duck, nc on the outer banks. there was a super moon and we were sitting watching it. we saw a light in the sky and we thought it was a plane because it blinked the moved sideways and then up and down and up and vanished. i was in awe and i waited to see it again but it did not show up
content.summary: Sitting on our deck near the beach at night and we saw a light high in the sky that moved up/down blinked then it went up and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Late one night my boy friend and i were just relaxing at home. he went outside in our back yard to look for something. he turned on his cell phone video camera to use the flash for a light and quickly spotted a bright green circular light almost like a laser on his cell phone screen and followed it. the light went crazy! it flew up and down, disappeared then reappeared. it stood still then went fast in different directions. it separated into 2 lights which looked like eye balls and then back to one. it also changed from bright green to yellow and back to green, then vanished. i was so shooken up when he came inside and showed me. i was yelling at him "you're messing me! stop it! you're scaring me thats not real! almost in tears i finally started to believe my boy friend hadn't set me up. we took another video that night and the next day around the yard to try and find an explanation. no neighbors were awake shining any lights and nothing could have possibly reflected. i wanted to immediately tell the world- so i told my neighbor that lived in the same duplex and he was watching a show on ufo's the same time the video was captured. i was shaking, in shock. i had recently been talking to my boyfriend about being open to spirits and some "woo woo" things but he always shot me down in disbelief. this video opened both of our eyes and minds. he saw another ufo the very next day! my boyfriend slowed the video down and took picutures of it. one picture looked exactly like the picture of my aura i had gotten taken at my school when i had a reading about a week before... i ran upstairs to get my picture to compare- which i kept in my journal with an elastic around it and had looked at earlier that day... and it was gone never to be seen again. i searched and searched... it just disappeared. i am determined to get more insight on this video and open my mind to anything thats is out there!
content.summary: Visible on cell phone only light appeared, flew around, high and low, separated, changed color and became 1 again.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I was routinely sitting in my hot tub gazing at the clear night sky when a square-shaped dull yellow light appeared above me about 500ft above the ground for about 5 seconds. the observed full moon of course was in another part of the sky. no! i was not under the influence of anything.

it was not any common flying aircraft. it was the size of a half of an aspirin held at arm's length. it made no sound.

since i was gazing above like i usually do looking at recognizable stars, constellations, and planets, i immediately fixated on the appearance and remembered to not look away but record in my memory what i was witnessing much like witnessing someone's actual automobile collision. 

the questions of course came rolling in later like they would when most people see something of this unknown nature. 

if you learn anything from this, you should remember to just be a witness and avoid the temptation to start asking yourself questions like "what is that?". asking yourself questions tends to distract you from the real goal which is recording the visual images in your head without looking away. you of course ask yourself distracting questions later.
content.summary: Square object appeared at night above me for 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my court yard having a cigarette with my dog and noticed a light that i have not seen coming from a plane or a helicopter before. i can only describe it as ultra violet, very bright with a red pulsing light which was smaller, as the ultra violet light was constant. it came into my field of vision from behind trees in my community moving at a very fast pace, moving se and ascending. when at the time it went just behind cloud cover for a moment then emerged and hovered over the middle star on orion's belt (only ref point i had at the time) it hovered for about 1.5 min's and then proceeded to descend and curve around, moving nw towards the everglades. at the time this was happening another plane was in the area as i live in delray we have a lot of air traffic with fort lauderdale airport, miami international and palm beach international airports right around us. i know this was not a plane or helicopter i know what the look like. very strange. i waited to see if i could see it again for about 5 min's but i could not see it. the color of the light i can describe it as when black light hits white, it was neon violet.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ultra violet light with pulsing red light moved se then hovered then moved nw very fast

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette on my front steps, around the end of january or the begining of february (i appologize i can't be more accurate with the date) just after midnight.  i was just looking at the sky and the stars when i saw a what i thought was a  shooting star, except instead of remaining in the usual straight/arching path it was following, it made a very quick abrupt turn into an s shape and then dissapeared. the entire incident was over in a matter of seconds.  the object looked very much like a shooting star, i couldn't identify any shape but it was very bright (i would say at least twice as bright as any other shooting star i have ever seen).  the trail of the object seemed to stay in the air for a brief second or two after it had passed and then dissapeared as well. i have no idea what that was, natural? unatural?  no freaking idea, but the moment it happened i was a little spooked out which quckly changed to confusion as i tried to figure out what i had seen.
content.summary: It looked like a shooting star (very bright) was traveling straight,then made an s turn and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Tonight when i was coming home from work i saw a few lights behind the trees when i was about to drive onto guinea road at the intersection of braddock road. i soon came to a red light, and curious, i rolled down my window just to see about 20 (maybe more) gold-colored lights moving above the traffic silently, all at the same, slow speed in one direction. they didn't seem to form a particular pattern, and i could not see any big objects. when i looked in front of me, i saw that the light had turned green, so i took off. when i came home and described the path of the objects to my family, they said that's the western direction. since i am bad with directions, i checked both "east to west" and "unknown" in the questions about direction. i thought about them maybe being drones, however, i cannot think of why 20 drones would be hovering over traffic at that time. i hope other people have reported this because it was an amazing sight, it reminded me of the phoenix lights. i hope you guys can shed some light onto this.
content.summary: Around 20 lights over guinea road

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i first witnessed between 20-30 objects way way up in the sky. they at first appeared to me as stars but then we noticed that they were moving. a plane flew overhead, the objects were both below the plane and above. i had wondered if it was waste from the plane but then we noticed that one was slowly decending lower and lower. we followed it until it was tree top height. it was a super dense, hovering and rotating cluster of bubbles. it was irridescent and not falling nearly as fast as i felt it should be. we saw a neighbour walking his small dog. i called him and showed him the object now about 20feet in the air. he was just as dumbfounded as i was about what it was. 

my intention had been to follow it to the ground but another dog came bolting at us. my neightbour protected his dog and i looked after my child as i watched it go over a roof top. once the stray dog had left i walked around to the front of the house but found nothing. looked breifly in trees, groud and sky. it was gone. 

we continued on walking as we were en route to my parents house for dinner. i called my dad freaking out. he was outside with his binoculars when we arrived. we were able to focus in on one of the remaining objects still very high in the sky (approx 5 were left). it looked like a cross or a cloaked angel. white, flowy, twirling, falling like a leaf. slowly they all disappeared. i took some horrible photos with my iphone, none of the bubble cluster of course. i spoke with tim wilson tonight, also of burlington. one of your investigators has already spoken with him. he encourgaged me to contact you.
content.summary: Multiple white objects very high, one close encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was sat on the bench having a fag [cigarette] looking at the sky it's 2:30am 3 round circular lights come slowly down in the sky then they stop 2 disappear then 1 stays and a beam of light appears and it's still here in front of me i have rang the police and they haven't taken any notice of this i have photo proof to prove it , i can't upload them on this website at this time and moment but i have the photo proof on my phone
content.summary: 3 lights came down 2 disappeared one left stay then beam of light appeared

content.detailedDescription:
I don't have the exact date,but that can be gotten from newspaper articles.Approximatlly 10:00pm while returning from albany medical center,after visiting my father,with my aunt and great aunt in the cari drove past a hovering ufo on the side of rte 684 in the hudson valley,just east of poughkeepsie.I had just gotten off the taconic pkwy. a fer minutes before and was heading toward rte 84 heading down to long island.Approximately one minute after passing a rest area,one of my passengers started screaming and pointing out the window.Then i saw this huge triangular shape hovering just off the side of the road about 50 feet off the ground.The front of the v shape had glass windows,and there appeared to be humanoid figures stsnding in them looking out.There was no sound,no vibration,and the grass and trees under it were not blowing.I had reduced my speed so as to get a decent look at it,even though my passengers were screaming at me to speed up.I wanted to stop and get my camera out of the trunk,but they were insistant that i keep moving.I would judge the ship to be atleast 300 ft. across.As ipast by it ,i looked back and the rear of the craft appeared to be emitting a blue light.It could be seen for quite some distance,even after i turned onto rte 84.
  i worked for delta airlines at the time and was due back at work in the morning.I had determined that i was not going to say anything lest i be called a flaming lunatic.But when i got into work the next morning,the whole operations office was buzzing about a ufo that had been hovering over lga the night before,at approximately the same time i saw my ufo the night before.There were a few people on duty who worked overtime the night beforeand they were telling everyone about a huge triangular ufo that hovered over lga,but it didn't stay stationary.It glided over the grand central pkwy,hovered over the marriot hotel,came back over the field and stayed for quit a while.Pilots radiod the about landing past it,taking off past it,but the tower could not pick it up on radar.Newsday[the long island newspaper] later roported that ther was a fleet of nineof these ships over new york that night.I can sketch this ship if you wish.
content.summary: I drove past ufo hovering on side of rte684 in hudson valley east of poughkeepsie the same night a similar ufo was hovering over lga airport.

content.detailedDescription: Learned incident second hand.  a ufo the size of a small car was hovering just above the plant buildings about 20-30 minutes. then headed toward the wind turbine farm next to the nuclear plant. never been discussed within the plant or news. infact, another one was noted during the day a week or two later.  i hear there is a video of the first object. the second object was "w" in shape. the second was witnessed by 2 employees but never reported. please, investigate this without contacting me. leave me out if this information!!!
content.summary: Hovering, glowing, size of small car, just above roofs; went towards wind generator farm

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog as usual every night about the same time every night.Walking up.My road and noticed a great orange orb of light between the houses.As l came to the top of my hill.The orb had turned and gone in a northerly direction so l just got the rear of it .It was it turned out the same as the front of it.So l stood around with my dog for about 5 minutes.And to my surprise it came back in exactly the same place.So l watched it again. turn and head due north from the east.As soon as it went out of site l turned and started to walk home.So your talking a couple of minutes.L turned back and it was there again.This happened 3 times.On the fourth time l was nearly home and it was there again.So over a period of 20 minutes it appeared 4 times.Taking the same path each time . there was no noise at all it was a clear night.There was plenty of planes in the night sky flashing lights and noise spot them a mile away or more...But this orb never seen anything like it.Before or unfortunately since.When l was nearly home l said to the lad from nexst door who was out walking his dog too. l looked back up the hill and it was there again. can you see that orange light took him a second to focus on it .Then he said yes his dad who was with him said thats a plane .L said its not. theres no noise.There was planes all over the sky you could see them and hear them and they don't fly that low.Or slow ....
content.summary: Walking the dog usual time.Could see orange orb between the houses

content.detailedDescription: On september 5th, i was on my deck in the back yard stargazing. there were very few clouds with not much movement. all of a sudden i see a large cloud that was moving at a steady slow pace. as i was looking at this cloud i realized that it was more of a mist. at the tail end of this object i could see small geometric shapes. at this point there was no sound or light coming from this object. moments after i saw the geometric shapes in the object it stopped moving, a buzzing noise started, and it began to move in my direction. i hurried inside and sat in my room. maybe 10 minutes after i had gotten inside i heard my mother coughing violently, and my dog yelp. i hurried downstairs to wake my mother from a dead sleep... after asking if she was okay, she told me she wasn't coughing and did not hear the dog yelp at the foot of her bed. as i was walking back upstairs i heard one solid tap on my front door. at this time i was sitting in my room. the blinds in my room were up, and my right ear began to hurt a lot (a horrible throbbing pain). as i turn to look out my window i watch an object move very quickly out of sight (my room is on the second floor). also my ear stopped hurting at this point. i decided to call a friend and explain what was happening. obviously he didn't believe me and wanted photo evidence. so i sat back down and waited for anything strange to happen. as my ear started to hurt yet again i quickly got up a took a picture. after i took the picture i tried to send it to my friend, but for some reason my cell phone stopped working along with my wifi. after around 30 minutes all went back to normal... until last night when they came back.
content.summary: Night time, saw cloud mist with geometric shapes at tail end, flew over my house, paused, the started in my direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Have you ever had anyone report paranormal experiences?  or uncommon occurrences that may/may not have been ufo related?  my mother and i along with my older sister and little brother were on our way to the store,  we pulled onto the hardtop road and a rain cloud from out of nowhere started to hover over our little vw beetle.  it really bothered me. it started to rain only on our car!  i could clearly see that rain was not falling any where else.  it actually followed our car down the road for approximately 2 miles.  when we rounded a curve it did too,  when we sped up it did to, when we slowed down it did too.  finally we go to the end of the road and made a right and the cloud and rain vanished.    i found it very odd that not one other car was on the road with us that entire time.  it's a small town but not that small, and it was in the middle of the day.  what bothered me too, is that as soon as we turned right and the rain cloud vanished it was if nothing had taken place.

  i asked my mama for an explanation as to what had just happened to us, and she acted as if it were a normal occurrence.  when i disagreed and said that it was not normal she just stopped talking all together and would not respond to my questions she just stared straight ahead, so did my sister and little brother... they were like in a daze or something, now i'm really freakin out.  once we got to the store they got out of the car and acted as if nothing had happened.

 i've thought about this a lot and i don't have any answers as to what happened that day. nor have i found any other accounts of something similar happening to someone else, so i thought i would ask you,  is this a normal experience?  does this happen ever so often to a lot of people?

please e-mail me back with a reply, as this is very important to me.  thank you in advance for your attention.

[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: This is a question i have no one else to ask.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was returning to my truck after shopping, i saw what appeared to be an airplane approaching from the ne.  what caught my attention was its appearance which was a very bright, white, fuzzy, elongated shape.  at first, i attributed this to a glint, but as it neared this appearance didn't change.  during its passage, it passed behind several, low, scattered clouds, the bases of which were at 3200 feet (as per the nws).

due to its appearance remaining ill-defined, i decided to get a picture of it.  by the time i had the camera out of the truck, turned on and zoomed, the object was nearing a tree in the parking lot, so i was only able to take one shot.  luckily, i captured the object just before it would have been lost behind the tree. as it was, it was just behind the tip of a leaf.  i did not see it emerge from the far side of the tree, but it was receding into the distance and would have likely been very distant at that point.
 
the object followed a straight-line trajectory at an elevation of 25 degrees above the horizon and was not leaving a contrail or any other trail.  it made no sound that i was able to discern.  the object's brightness and appearance were constant until it disappeared from view behind the tree.
 
the camera is an image-stabilized canon power shot a710 with 6x optical zoom.  digital zoom was not selected.  when the image was examined, i saw that the object was just as i had seen it--an elongated, bright white, fuzzy shape.

a subsequent test of the camera photographing an airplane at considerable distance, and in the same frame with a tree 50 feet from the camera, resolved the plane with no problem.  that seems to confirm that the camera was essentially focused at infinity when the exposure was made.  there was no post-processing of the image.
 
i later went back and traced the outline of a leaf from the tree which could be used for scaling the object's size if there would be some way to determine its distance or altitude.  as mentioned, the tree was at a distance of 50 feet from where the photo was taken.  based on the total duration of the sighting (50 seconds) and arc through which it was observed (100 degrees), the average angular velocity is 2 degrees per second.
 
i have attached the full-frame photo and a cropped zoom done with window's photo viewer.
content.summary: Luminous fuzzy daylight object observed.

content.detailedDescription: Just interview me.
content.summary: I will explain the rest in person. of this marvooulus event. .....
